title: Game crashes after champ select.
body: Since May the 6th, I have not been able to load the game after the champion select. It comes to a black screen or makes it to the loading screen, but it never makes it into the game itself. It always says attempt to reconnect but it never does.I've looked at my firewall and security, and everything checks out ok. It may just be the servers, but I'm not sure.

replies.body: This likely means that for some reason you're not able to connect to the game server itself.  Could be a few reasons for that, but to help us get started can you go ahead and run through the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? There's a few additional steps in there which should help us figure out what's stopping you from connecting to the game server.
I can spectate games as well, just not play them. I'll try the steps. Thanks for the reply!
It seems as though it's the servers. It says they are busy at times and others it lets me log on instantly. I tried the things in the steps, but none of them have worked yet.
